Current insulin rate does not match previous recommendation
Dextrose 10% rate does not match previous recommendation ({measureN('D10Reco')} mL/hr)
{var gluc = measureN('synth_glucose'); return (gluc<=140?175: gluc<=180?150: gluc<=220?125: gluc<=260?100: gluc<=300?50: 0)}
Set the Dextrose 10% to {var reco = ref('TEXT','recoD10Rate'); return addCEonSign('D10Reco', reco )} mL/hr

Consult provider about increasing insulin rate for Triglycerides > 1000 after 12 hours
Recommended Rate: {(measureN('Weight KG')*0.15).toFixed(1)} mL/hr
0.15 units/kg/hr * {measureN('Weight KG')} kg = {(measureN('Weight KG')*0.15).toFixed(1)} mL/hr {return addCEonSign('RateRecommended',(measureN('Weight KG')*0.15).toFixed(1),"");}

Blood sugar is less than 70 mg/dL, stop insulin infusion and follow hypoglycemia protocol.  Restart IV insulin at 50% of the previous rate when blood glucose is > 100 mg/dL { addCEonSign('RateRecommended',0); return ""}

Decrease insulin drip to {(measureN('Weight KG')*0.05).toFixed(1)} mL/hr as glucose is less than 101
0.05 units/kg/hr * {measureN('Weight KG')} kg = {(measureN('Weight KG')*0.05).toFixed(1)} mL/hr {return addCEonSign('RateRecommended',(measureN('Weight KG')*0.05).toFixed(1),"");}
Triglycerides < 1000.  Consult MD for possible need to add oral meds to decrease triglycerides

ORDERABLE.MNEMONICKEYCAP: INSULIN INFUSION PROTOCOL ADVISOR, HYPERTRIGLYCERIDEMIA - HTG
INSULIN REGULAR, HUMAN REC/NS 250 UNITS/250 ML
POTASSIUM CHLORIDE 10 MEQ/50 ML INTRAVENOUS SOLUTION
POTASSIUM CHLORIDE 10 MEQ/100 ML INTRAVENOUS SOLUTION
POTASSIUM CHLORIDE 20 MEQ/100 ML INTRAVENOUS SOLUTION
BLOOD GAS ARTERIAL W LACTATE GWU

OBJECT.DISPLAY: Hypertriglyceridemia Advisor is intended for use in adult patients only

SUB.DEBUG: {measureN('synth_Potassium') < ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW')} AND ({measureN('Creatinine')} <= {ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH')} AND {measureN('Creatinine Clearance')} > {ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')}) AND {orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')} AND ({measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm')} > {measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm')} )

SUB.CONDITIONAL: (measureN('synth_Potassium') < ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW') AND (measureN('Creatinine') > ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH') AND measureN('Creatinine Clearance') <= ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')) AND orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')) AND (measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm') > measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm') )
SUB.DEBUG: ({measureN('synth_Potassium')} < {ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW')} AND ({measureN('Creatinine')} > {ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH')} AND {measureN('Creatinine Clearance')} <= {ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')}) AND {orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')}) AND ({measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm')} > {measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm')} )

SUB.CONDITIONAL: (measureN('synth_Potassium') < ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW') AND (measureN('Creatinine') > ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH') AND measureN('Creatinine Clearance') > ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')) AND orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')) AND (measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm') > measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm') )
SUB.DEBUG: ({measureN('synth_Potassium')} < {ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW')} AND ({measureN('Creatinine')} > {ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH')} AND {measureN('Creatinine Clearance')} > {ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')}) AND {orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')}) AND ({measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm')} > {measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm')} )

SUB.CONDITIONAL: (measureN('synth_Potassium') < ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW') AND (measureN('Creatinine') <= ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH') AND measureN('Creatinine Clearance') <= ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')) AND orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')) AND (measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm') > measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm') )
SUB.DEBUG: ({measureN('synth_Potassium')} < {ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW')} AND ({measureN('Creatinine')} <= {ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH')} AND {measureN('Creatinine Clearance')} <= {ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')}) AND {orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')}) AND ({measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm')} > {measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm')} )

SUB.CONDITIONAL: (measureN('synth_Potassium') >= ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW') AND measureN('synth_Potassium') <= ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_HIGH') AND (measureN('Creatinine') <= ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH') AND measureN('Creatinine Clearance') > ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')) AND orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')) AND (measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm') > measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm') )
SUB.DEBUG: ({measureN('synth_Potassium')} >= {ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW')} AND {measureN('synth_Potassium')} <= {ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_HIGH')} AND ({measureN('Creatinine')} <= {ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH')} AND {measureN('Creatinine Clearance')} > {ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')}) AND {orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')}) AND ({measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm')} > {measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm')} )

SUB.CONDITIONAL: (measureN('synth_Potassium') >= ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW') AND measureN('synth_Potassium') <= ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_HIGH') AND (measureN('Creatinine') > ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH') AND measureN('Creatinine Clearance') <= ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')) AND orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')) AND (measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm') > measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm') )
SUB.DEBUG: ({measureN('synth_Potassium')} >= {ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW')} AND {measureN('synth_Potassium')} <= {ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_HIGH')} AND ({measureN('Creatinine')} > {ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH')} AND {measureN('Creatinine Clearance')} <= {ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')}) AND {orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')}) AND ({measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm')}  > {measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm')} )

SUB.CONDITIONAL: (measureN('synth_Potassium') >= ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW') AND measureN('synth_Potassium') <= ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_HIGH') AND (measureN('Creatinine') > ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH') AND measureN('Creatinine Clearance') > ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')) AND orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')) AND (measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm') > measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm') )
SUB.DEBUG: ({measureN('synth_Potassium')} >= {ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW')} AND {measureN('synth_Potassium')} <= {ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_HIGH')} AND ({measureN('Creatinine')} > {ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH')} AND {measureN('Creatinine Clearance')} > {ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')}) AND {orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')}) AND ({measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm')} > {measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm')} )

SUB.CONDITIONAL: (measureN('synth_Potassium') >= ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW') AND measureN('synth_Potassium') <= ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_HIGH') AND (measureN('Creatinine') <= ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH') AND measureN('Creatinine Clearance') <= ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')) AND orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')) AND (measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm') > measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm') )
SUB.DEBUG: ({measureN('synth_Potassium')} >= {ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_LOW')} AND {measureN('synth_Potassium')} <= {ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_HIGH')} AND ({measureN('Creatinine')} <= {ref('CREATININE','NORMAL_HIGH')} AND {measureN('Creatinine Clearance')} <= {ref('CR CLEARANCE','NORMAL_LOW')}) AND {orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')}) AND ({measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm')}  > {measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm')} )

SUB.CONDITIONAL: (measureN('synth_Potassium') >= ref('POTASSIUM','CRITICAL_HIGH') AND orderinfo('POTASSIUM CHLORIDE - IV - ICU')) AND (measure('synth_Potassium',0,'performed_dttm') > measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm') )
measureN('Mg Lvl') < ref('Mg Lvl','CRITICAL_LOW') AND orderinfo('MAGNESIUM SULFATE - IV') AND (measure('Mg Lvl',0,'performed_dttm') > measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm') )
SUB.DEBUG: {measureN('Mg Lvl')} < {ref('Mg Lvl','CRITICAL_LOW')} AND {orderinfo('MAGNESIUM SULFATE - IV')} AND ({measure('Mg Lvl',0,'performed_dttm')} > {measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm')} )

SUB.CONDITIONAL: measureN('Mg Lvl') >= ref('Mg Lvl','CRITICAL_LOW') AND measureN('Mg Lvl') <= ref('Mg Lvl','NORMAL_HIGH') AND orderinfo('MAGNESIUM SULFATE - IV') AND (measure('Mg Lvl',0,'performed_dttm') > measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm') )
SUB.DEBUG: {measureN('Mg Lvl')} >= {ref('Mg Lvl','CRITICAL_LOW')} AND {measureN('Mg Lvl')} <= {ref('Mg Lvl','NORMAL_HIGH')} AND {orderinfo('MAGNESIUM SULFATE - IV')} AND ({measure('Mg Lvl',0,'performed_dttm')} > {measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm')} )

SUB.CONDITIONAL: measureN('Phosphorus') <= ref('PHOSPHORUS','CRITICAL_LOW') AND orderinfo('SODIUM PHOSPHATE - ORAL & IV') AND (measure('Phosphorus',0,'performed_dttm') > measure('AdvisorStart',1,'dttm') )
